column1: This is a list of long place names.
== Single-word names ==
== Names with spaces or hyphens ==

Krungthepmahanakhon Amonrattanakosin Mahintharayutthaya Mahadilokphop Noppharatratchathaniburirom Udomratchaniwetmahasathan Amonphimanawatansathit Sakkathattiyawitsanukamprasit (176 letters) Full name of Bangkok
in Thai: กรุงเทพมหานคร อมรรัตนโกสินทร์ มหินทรายุธยา มหาดิลกภพ นพรัตนราชธานีบูรีรมย์ อุดมราชนิเวศน์มหาสถาน อมรพิมานอวตารสถิต สักกะทัตติยวิษณุกรรมประสิทธิ์ (132 letters + 7 spaces)

The U.S. state with the longest name is Rhode Island
column2: which officially is named “the State of Rhode Island and Providence Plantations.”

column1: The original name of Los Angeles
column4: was "El Pueblo de Nuestra Señora la Reina de los Ángeles del Río de Porciúncula"; in English this means "The Town of Our Lady the Queen of Angels of the Porciúncula River".

column1: The longest hyphenated name in England is the 29-letter-long name Sutton-under-Whitestonecliffe
column2: the name of a tiny village in North Yorkshire.

column1: The longest names for communes in France
The longest place name in Austria is Pfaffenschlag bei Waidhofen an der Thaya (40 characters).
The longest place name in Spain is Colinas del Campo de Martín Moro Toledano de Castilla y León
column2: in the province of León (50 characters).

column1: The longest place name in Finland is Semmonen niemi
column3: in the municipality of Perho (36 characters
column4: including a comma). The English translation is That cape where a snake bit the dog.

column1: The longest municipality name in the Czech Republic is the name of Nová Ves u Nového Města na Moravě (33 characters
column2: English translation: "New Village in near of New Town in Moravia)
column3: the second one is the city of Brandýs nad Labem-Stará Boleslav (32 characters

column1: The longest single place name in Germany is Hellschen-Heringsand-Unterschaar in Schleswig-Holstein (32 characters). In the standard official naming scheme
column3: small villages are disambiguated by prefixing them with the name of the main town in the district. The longest official place name is therefore Michelbach an der Bilz-Gschlachtenbretzingen (40 characters).

column1: The longest place names in Italy are Pino sulla Sponda del Lago Maggiore and San Valentino in Abruzzo Citeriore
column3: or it's Cortaccia sulla Strada del Vino - Kurtatsch an der Weinstraße considering the official name both in Italian and German.

column1: The longest place names in Poland are Sobienie Kiełczewskie Pierwsze and Przedmieście Szczebrzeszyńskie
The longest place name in the Netherlands is Westerhaar-Vriezenveensewijk (28 characters
The longest place name in Malaysia is Kampung Simpang Tiga Durian Chondong (32 letters)
The municipality with the longest name in Brazil is Vila Bela da Santíssima Trindade
The municipality with the longest name in Mexico is Dolores Hidalgo Cuna de la Independencia Nacional (49 characters).
The longest place name in Mexico is San Pedro y San Pablo Tequixtepec (28 letters).
The longest city name in Argentina is San Fernando del Valle de Catamarca (30 letters).
Truth or Consequences is a spa city and the county seat of Sierra County
Bellefontaine Neighbors
column4: it has the longest name of any incorporated place in the United States.

column1: The longest name of a settlement in Russia with spaces (not counting official names of municipalities) is (in ISO 9) "posyolok Central'noj usad'by` sovxoza imeni 40-letiya Velikogo Oktyabrya" (Russian: посёлок Центральной усадьбы совхоза имени 40-летия Великого Октября
column2: 50 letters (if not counting the word posyolok/посёлок
column3: which is a generic name for a settlement)
column5: which would give another 6 letters). The English translation is a settlement of The Central Farmstead of the Sovkhoz named after the 40-years Anniversary of the Great October.

column1: The longest hyphenated name of a settlement in Belgium is Chaussée-Notre-Dame-Louvignies
The longest hyphenated name of a settlement in Russia is Kremenchug-Konstantinovskoye (Кременчуг-Константиновское
column2: 25 letters). The English translation is (new) Kremenchug named after Konstantin (a first settler)".

column1: The longest name of a settlement in Croatia is Gornje Mrzlo Polje Mrežničko (25 letters). The English translation is Upper cold field near Mrežnica.
The longest municipality name in the Philippines is General Salipada K. Pendatun
column2: named after the Mindanaoan general and senator of the same name. (24 characters).
